# Malefics, Aspects, and Angular Stress

Classical mundane astrology emphasizes malefic angular relationships as destabilizing triggers [@bphs; @varahamihira_brihat_samhita].

## Malefic Set

We define malefics as:

**Mars, Saturn, Rahu, Ketu**

## Aspect Definitions

All **major aspects** are included:

- Conjunction (0°)
- Sextile (60°)
- Square (90°)
- Trine (120°)
- Opposition (180°)

## Formal Rule

For planet pair $(i,j)$ and aspect angle $\theta$:

$$
|(\lambda_i - \lambda_j) \bmod 360 - \theta| \leq \epsilon
$$

We evaluate all orbs $\epsilon \in \{1^\circ, 3^\circ, 5^\circ, 8^\circ\}$.

## Exhaustive Coverage

All malefic–malefic, malefic–benefic, and all-planet pairs are enumerated in the Master Combination Catalog.
